content:
You see the two tall, distinct mushrooms you’ve dubbed the Ferrymen. As you approach, the voices whispering on the edge of your conscious start to get louder again. You know that if you want, you can speak to those in the network once more.

If there is a voice token in play, you may move it to the Ferrymen.

Clear the Ferrymen with   to use their connection to to the network.
